comp124graphics

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp124graphics.GraphicsObject
      • comp124graphics.Image

  • public class Image
extends GraphicsObject
    Used to draw an image on the screen. Created by bjackson on 9/15/2016.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor to create the Image object and initialize its instance variables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Image

        public Image(int x,
             int y,
             java.lang.String filePath)
        Constructor to create the Image object and initialize its instance variables. Acceptable file formats include: GIF, PNG, JPEG, BMP, and WBMP
        Parameters:
        x - position
        y - position
        filePath - filepath to image file to load.
